page.title: 20Science and Technology.
page.content: Within our 'block' there are numerous high technology firms,e.g.{Microvitec who make computer display screens, no doubt they made the one you are now using. If you have flown on a 747 Jumbo Jet the turbine blades in the engines were designed in Bradford at {Lucas Aerospace.}These are two examples of very large firms, there are also a few hundred other small high technology firms. {CREDITS} The material about the South Bradford 'block' was gathered together by 4 schools:- E. Bierley Church of England School St. Matthews First School Holme Middle School { { Ryan Middle School { acted as co-ordinator { and editor for 'block'. }
